00198 /* Internally used for mapping socket functions on IOCTLs */
00199 struct _rtdm_getsockopt_args {
00200     int                             level;
00201     int                             optname;
00202     void                            *optval;
00203     socklen_t                       *optlen;
00204 };

00210     socklen_t                       optlen;

00261 /* Define RTDM_NO_DEFAULT_USER_API to switch off the default rt_dev_xxx
00262  * interface when providing a customised user API */
00263 #ifndef RTDM_NO_DEFAULT_USER_API
00264 
00265 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00266 
00267 #define rt_dev_open(path, oflag, ...)                           \
00268     _rtdm_open(NULL, path, oflag)
00269 
00270 #define rt_dev_socket(protocol_family, socket_type, protocol)   \
00271     _rtdm_socket(NULL, protocol_family, socket_type, protocol)
00272 
00273 #define rt_dev_close(fd)                                        \
00274     _rtdm_close(NULL, fd)
00275 
00276 #define rt_dev_ioctl(fd, request, ...)                          \
00277     _rtdm_ioctl(NULL, fd, request, __VA_ARGS__)
00278 
00279 #define rt_dev_read(fd, buf, nbyte)                             \
00280     _rtdm_read(NULL, fd, buf, nbyte)
00281 
00282 #define rt_dev_write(fd, buf, nbyte)                            \
00283     _rtdm_write(NULL, fd, buf, nbyte)
00284 
00285 #define rt_dev_recvmsg(fd, msg, flags)                          \
00286     _rtdm_recvmsg(NULL, fd, msg, flags)
00287 
00288 #define rt_dev_sendmsg(fd, msg, flags)                          \
00289     _rtdm_sendmsg(NULL, fd, msg, flags)

00291 
00292 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_recvfrom(int fd, void *buf, size_t len, int flags,
00293                                       struct sockaddr *from,
00294                                       socklen_t *fromlen)
00295 {
00296     struct iovec iov;
00297     struct msghdr msg;
00298     int ret;
00299 
00300     iov.iov_base = buf;
00301     iov.iov_len = len;
00302 
00303     msg.msg_name = from;
00304     msg.msg_namelen = from ? *fromlen : 0;
00305     msg.msg_iov = &iov;
00306     msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00307     msg.msg_control = NULL;
00308     msg.msg_controllen = 0;
00309 
00310     ret = rt_dev_recvmsg(fd, &msg, flags);
00311     if (ret >= 0 && from)
00312         *fromlen = msg.msg_namelen;
00313     return ret;
00314 }
00315 
00316 #else  /* !__KERNEL__ */

00319 extern "C" {
00320 #endif

00345 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_recv(int fd, void *buf, size_t len, int flags)
00346 {
00347     return rt_dev_recvfrom(fd, buf, len, flags, NULL, NULL);
00348 }
00349 
00350 
00351 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_sendto(int fd, const void *buf, size_t len,
00352                                     int flags, const struct sockaddr *to,
00353                                     socklen_t tolen)
00354 {
00355     struct iovec iov;
00356     struct msghdr msg;
00357 
00358     iov.iov_base = (void *)buf;
00359     iov.iov_len = len;
00360 
00361     msg.msg_name = (struct sockaddr *)to;
00362     msg.msg_namelen = tolen;
00363     msg.msg_iov = &iov;
00364     msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
00365     msg.msg_control = NULL;
00366     msg.msg_controllen = 0;
00367 
00368     return rt_dev_sendmsg(fd, &msg, flags);
00369 }
00370 
00371 
00372 static inline ssize_t rt_dev_send(int fd, const void *buf, size_t len,
00373                                   int flags)
00374 {
00375     return rt_dev_sendto(fd, buf, len, flags, NULL, 0);
00376 }

00379 static inline int rt_dev_getsockopt(int fd, int level, int optname,
00380                                     void *optval, socklen_t *optlen)
00381 {
00382     struct _rtdm_getsockopt_args args = {level, optname, optval, optlen};
00383 
00384     return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_GETSOCKOPT, &args);
00385 }
00386 
00387 
00388 static inline int rt_dev_setsockopt(int fd, int level, int optname,
00389                                     const void *optval, socklen_t optlen)
00390 {
00391     struct _rtdm_setsockopt_args args =
00392     {level, optname, (void *)optval, optlen};
00393 
00394     return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_SETSOCKOPT, &args);
00395 }

00398 static inline int rt_dev_bind(int fd, const struct sockaddr *my_addr,
00399                               socklen_t addrlen)
00400 {
00401     struct _rtdm_setsockaddr_args args = {my_addr, addrlen};
00402 
00403     return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_BIND, &args);
00404 }

00407 static inline int rt_dev_connect(int fd, const struct sockaddr *serv_addr,
00408                                  socklen_t addrlen)
00409 {
00410     struct _rtdm_setsockaddr_args args = {serv_addr, addrlen};
00411 
00412     return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_CONNECT, &args);
00413 }

00416 static inline int rt_dev_listen(int fd, int backlog)
00417 {
00418     return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_LISTEN, backlog);
00419 }

00422 static inline int rt_dev_accept(int fd, struct sockaddr *addr,
00423                                 socklen_t *addrlen)
00424 {
00425     struct _rtdm_getsockaddr_args args = {addr, addrlen};
00426 
00427     return rt_dev_ioctl(fd, _RTIOC_ACCEPT, &args);
00428 }

00432                                      socklen_t *namelen)

00440 static inline int rt_dev_getpeername(int fd, struct sockaddr *name,
